name: Stefan Haar
content: Laboratoire Spécification et Vérification Stefan Haar Senior Researcher (DR2) INRIA Head of MExICo team Selected Publications include.html Research Subjects Petri net theory, in particular occurrence nets Concurrency theory Process Mining Diagnosis and Diagnosability Stochastic discrete event systems Formal methods for Systems biology and synthetic biology Short CV I studied Mathematics, Philosophy and Computer science at Hamburg U/Germany and at Johns Hopkins University, USA. My PhD in Computer science is from Hamburg University in 1997; after a postdoctoral period at Humboldt University of Berlin, INRIA Nancy and ENS Paris, I joined INRIA Rennes as a research scientist in 2001. After a visiting position at Ottawa University/CA in 2007 and another with ALCATEL-Lucent/Bell Labs at Ottawa, I moved to the INRIA Saclay center in 200,8 and founded the MExICo team at ENS Cachan. My "habilitation" was completed in 2008.
